modName: Patch for Winter Is Coming - Cloaks of Skyrim - Fur Hoods
summary: Northborn Fur Hoods now works together with WIC and Cloaks of Skyrim through leveled lists and vendors.
descriptionHtml:
Patch for: Winter Is Coming - Cloaks of Skyrim – Northborn Fur Hoods


[SIZE=5][B]Notes[/B][/SIZE]

Compatible with the last version of the mods, compatible with Dawnguard and Dragonborn.

[B][SIZE=4] Now you have the option of playing just with WIC stuff plus FurHoods. For those who does not like playing with cloaks of Skyrim mod. If this is you, grab \"Patch only WIC-Fur Hoods without cloaks\"[/SIZE][/B]

[B][SIZE=4]All this mods and this patch are now compatible with SKYRE ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286[/url]) using the new tool Reproccer ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28467/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28467[/url]).
For those who likes playing with SkyRe

Greetings[/SIZE][/B]
 [center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/articles/1152/][img]http://oi45.tinypic.com/116svaf.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[B][SIZE=4][color=yellow]
==========   
Options
========== 

A- Patch Cloaks-WIC-Fur Hoods (2.1)[/color]

Everything together, a lot of new winter items for your game!
[color=yellow]
B-Patch Cloaks-WIC-Fur Hoods with Hoods as more common items (2.2b)[/color]

Everything together, if you are playing with mods that adds new content (like immersive armors), this one will help to balance the content. Al for those who wants to find the items more often.
[color=yellow]
C- Patch only WIC-Fur Hoods without cloaks (1.0)[/color]

Made by request. No cloaks of skyrim, just WIC+FurHoods.

[/SIZE][/B]

==========   
CHANGE-LOG
========== 

Version 2.2b
Minor adjustments

Version 2.2 
by request, the hoods are now more common items, less rare. Use it if you want the northborn hoods appear more often. 

Version2.1 
Final (Till I add more content)
Cleaned with Tes5Edit

Version 2 
(NEW VERSION!!)
NOTE: This patch edits the leveled lists and Outfit lists to play all the mods nice and smooth together (It modifies the patch of WIC-Cloaks that already added the new enchanted versions of Cloaks of Skyrim plus linen wraps to spawn at merchants, with this new one that also includes the great hoods from northborn mod \"Fur Hoods\" in the leveled list to vendors and spawning in some NPC´s).

IT DO NOT work with the “non-imperial” version of the cloaks mod. (maybe in the future…)

Edited with TES5Edit, now works better and is properly cleaned!, solved master dependencies problems.

Hoods now have balanced prices with WIC, now everything fits better!.

Version 1
First Release.

==========   
REQUIREMENTS
========== 

[B]Required Files [/B]

-  Cloaks of Skyrim
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092[/url]
Last Version: 1.2

EDIT: So far also compatible with cloaks update 1.2! However, if you are using the patch of cloaks for Dawnguard, you still need it. 

-  Winter is coming
Version: 2.2
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486[/url]

EDIT: So far also compatible with WIC update 2.2!

- Fur hoods
Version: 1.5b
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3201/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3201[/url]

[color=yellow](if you are going to play option C you only need the last two)[/color]
==========
INSTRUCTIONS:
==========

Download ALL Textures and Meshes, ¡you will need then all! , you can install the mods manually or using your favorite installation mod manager (Wrye, NMM, MO,…)
THIS PATCH DOES NOT CONTAIN ANY MESHES OR TEXTURES.
Please, remember to endorse the really great work of those guys, they worked for free for you, your endorsements are your way to say “thank you”. It is free, take less than a five seconds and it says a lot about you. 
READ ALL THE “READ ME” FILES, (YES, the three of them) most of your question about contents, distribution, etc…. are already answered there.

============   
Installation   
============ 

Install the following mods, use the procedures included in the “READ ME”

- Download and Install Cloaks of Skyrim
Use
Cloaks.esp - Regular version. Cloaks are distributed throughout levelled lists and hand-placed in the world, as well as being craftable.

- Download and install Winter is Coming
Use
1nivWICCloaks.esp: This is the main plugin for WIC, it places items through out the game in chests/npcs/vendors AND crafting.

- Download and Install Fur Hoods
Use
Northborn Fur Hoods.esp: This is the main plugin, does distribute nothing in the world, but made the items craftable.

Your load order should be by then

    Cloaks.esp 
    1nivWICCloaks.esp 
    Northborn Fur Hoods.esp
    .
    .
(And then the patch, should be installed after those)
    .
    1nivWICSkyCloaksNorthPatch.esp

-------------------
Manual Installation of the Patch
-------------------

1. Make sure you installed your selected .esp/meshs/textures into your Data folder found in Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/
And you DID NOT FORGET ANYTHING (or it won´t show in game).

2. Use 7zip to extract the files. Extract the 1nivWICCloaksNorthPatch.esp to your Data folder.

3. Arrange your load order to be exactly

Cloaks.esp 
1nivWICCloaks.esp 
Northborn Fur Hoods.esp
1nivWICCloaksNorthPatch.esp

4. Turn on the .esps in your choice of mod manager, or the Skyrim game data files menu.

5. Finished.

==============   
Uninstallation   
==============

Delete de Patch .esp
If you do so, the leveled list shared between the three mods will disappear, you won´t find some of the cloaks in vendors or in the world any more.

==============   
Questions 
==============
Q-is this compatible with dawnguard or only no dawnguard? and dragonborn?
A-It is compatible with everything, but if your are using dawnguard and you want the cloaks from cloak of sjyrim mod you still need to use the small dawnguard patch included in cloaks of skyrim. This pluggin itself does not contain info from dawnguard nor dragonborn, but as far as they use the leveled lists included here, the items will be there.

Q-Do I need the old WIC-Cloaks Patch from WIC compatibility patch?
A-No, all the data and information contained in that patch is already included in this one. What I have done is basically take the old one and just expanded it to include Northborn Fur Hoods in leveled lists, vendors, etc… just to make the three of them compatible and working together at the same time.

Q-How long it will take see all the stuff in game?
A-As soon as the NPC and vendors list reset and NPC re-spawn, that is around a week ingame time. Areas that you have not explored yet should be fine

Q-Was it tested?
A- Yes, it was with no problems so far. The only thing is that Northborn Fur Hoods are a bit underpriced compared with WIC stuff.

Q-It is multilingual .esp?
A-Any item will keep the name in its original language, except northborn fur hoods, because their items price were edited.

Q-Are those mods still compatible with Frostfall or Hypothermia?
A-Personally I am not using it, but the patch ONLY touch the leveled lists and nothing else, so I think that those of the three mods already compatible with Hypothermia still are (I think currently all of them are). If you want it, you should request that to the author).

Q- This mod crashes my game before the main menu. 
A- Did you update your Skyrim to the latest version? It has nothing to do with this patch; remember that those mods required Skyrim to be updated to at least 1.6.89.0 to work properly. Also, did you install everything?, sure?, WIC, cloaks and northborn are pluggins that are masters of this one, you need to load then because if just one is not there or not ticked the game will crash.

Q- I already had the Hoods because I am using \"Inmersive Armors\", and the Hodds are there. Do I need this?
A- If you already have Immersive armors you don´t really need this patch, but you can still use it with no trouble.
Cloaks and WIC add its items ingame trough their own leveled lists (not the vanilla ones, but its own), I just included the hoods in such lists, so now you have the chance to get those items ingame together (in NPC, vendors, chests, etc..) with hoods mixed up with all the other cloaks and WIC stuff.
Immersive armors already add the hoods ingame and does pretty much the same, but using other different leveled lists than WIC and cloaks (it edits some of the vanilla ones), with that lists you will find them mostly as armors on NPC and loot.
Basically, I did this patch focusing in those not using immersive armors or those using just some of them as standalone armors, so they do not miss the hoods.
However, I felt that the hoods fit better with the kind of stuff that cloaks and WIC are adding and I personally prefer the hoods distribution ingame that way; it is just a matter of personal choice.
But you can still use both the patch and immersive armors together (I do) because there is no conflict at all, the only thing you have to choose is in which way you want your items appearing ingame (Both fit well, using both could be a bit redundant, but just a little and is almost not noticeable), so it is up to you to use it or not. 
   
=====================   
CREDITS
=====================   

Thanks to Nivea for meshes and textures. Great Mod!
Thanks Nikinoodles and huge credit to Backsteppo and Zenl for creating the excellent cloak/cape meshes
Thanks to Hemingwey for his excellent textures.
Thanks to Jean-Philippe \"NORTHBORN\" Laliberté, for his Fur Hoods 
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator

===============   
Licensing/Legal   
===============

All credits belongs to the original authors
If you want to use something, you must contact the original authors because this patch it does not contain anything. I have just used Nivea permission to create a patch that includes Northborn hoods in-game. Respect their work and contact them if you need anything.

This patch does not contain anything (Meshes or Textures) but the patch itself

It is based on WIC-Cloaks Patch, so I will keep Nivea requirements about his mods, means:
    It is not to be used without permission for things like
           Uploading to a different site then Nexus
           Uploading to Steam Workshop
If I see this patch on Steam Workshop I will be very unhappy.

==========   
Contact   
==========

Post in comments section for any questions/reviews
 
==========
author: Khamuy
